text: Joseph Sterling Williams (born September 4, 1993) is an American football running back who is a free agent. He played college football at Utah."Joe Williams unusual return from retirement to save Utah's playoff hopes," CBS Sports, October 27, 2016, retrieved May 11, 2017. He was drafted in the fourth round, 121st overall, by the San Francisco 49ers in the 2017 NFL Draft. ==High school career== Williams played high school football at Emmaus High School in the competitive Eastern Pennsylvania Conference in the Lehigh Valley region of Pennsylvania.Joe Williams biography, University of Utah football, retrieved May 11, 2017 ==College career== Williams committed to the University of Connecticut in 2012 before transferring to ASA College in New York City. In 2015, he transferred to the University of Utah. After being at Utah for a year, Williams retired from playing football to focus on other aspects of his life. He would quickly return on October 22, 2016, where he set the school record for rushing yards in a single game with 332 against UCLA.Joe Williams, recently unretired, runs for 332 yards in Utah win In the 2016 Foster Farms Bowl against Indiana, Williams took home the Offensive MVP after finishing with 222 rush yards, 1 rushing TD, and 56 receiving yards.Williams leads Utah past Indiana 26-24 in Foster Farms Bowl In 2016, Williams rushed for 1,407 yards and ten rushing touchdowns in just nine games. ==Professional career== Williams was drafted by the San Francisco 49ers in the fourth round, 121st overall, in the 2017 NFL Draft. He was the 11th running back selected in that year's draft. He was placed on injured reserve on September 2, 2017 with an ankle injury. On August 31, 2018, Williams was waived by the 49ers. ==References== ==External links== *Utah Utes biography Category:1993 births Category:Living people Category:American football running backs Category:UConn Huskies football players Category:Emmaus High School alumni Category:Players of American football from Pennsylvania Category:San Francisco 49ers players Category:Sportspeople from Allentown, Pennsylvania Category:Utah Utes football players
title: Joe Williams (running back, born 1993)
